entry.title: Privacy Policy
entry.summary: PRIVACY POLICY Last updated November 22, 2023 This privacy notice for Bedman (“we,” “us,” or “our”), describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share (“process”) your information when you use our services (“Services”), such as when you: Download and use our mobile application (Muay Thai Shadow), or any other application of ours that links to this privacy notice ...

entry.title: Project 10000
entry.summary: What is this? A project that will cost 10000 hours to master a course, whatever topic it is about. How to achieve it? To achieve this goal, there is a list of items needed to be prepared before implementation: A goal to achieve A time recorder to record the time spent on achieving this goal A continuous (monthly / quarterly) reflection plan Latest update Although this post was publish...

entry.title: Intermediate Python
entry.summary: As all known, there are two versions of Python, Python 2 and Python 3. One suggestion: learn python 3. From Python 2 sunset announcement, it states that 2020/01/01 will be the day to sunset Python 2. During that time, Python 2 will stop maintenance. Time to transfer to Python 3 lah. Another suggestion is that pls keep critical thinking. This blog was initially intended to be a se...
